alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Emanuel, Toombs and Montgomery Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1214 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Twin City to near Higgston to Hazlehurst, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Twin City, Uvalda, Stillmore, Oak Park, Ailey, Higgston, Garfield, Santa Claus, Alston, Ohoopee, New Branch, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner, George L Smith State Park and Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central, southeastern and east central Georgia.
